title: Which technology should I use for a movie website? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you building a web app? Or a static site with added blog functionality? The frameworks you have mentioned mostly point to a web app. And from someone who has developed with MEAN stack in the past and now a converted Meteor developer, I suggest Meteor.js.  You can rapidly prototype a barebones app within a few hours (with significant skills) something which I have suffered days to try and build in the past.
For developing a new website you can prefer to PHP or RoR. Both are the trending technologies for development. For development please feel free to contact PixelCrayons
